rooms.title: The Watchtower
rooms.description: You are floating inside a huge column formed by a purple whirlwind.

rooms.title: The Northern Archway
rooms.description: The walls of the archway are made of an extremely smooth kind of stone. While you're examining it, you see a black substance inside, moving slightly, as if it knows you are watching.

rooms.title: The Eastern Archway
rooms.description: The walls of the archway are made of an extremely smooth kind of stone. While you're examining it, you see a black substance inside, moving slightly, as if it knows you are watching.

rooms.title: The Southern Archway
rooms.description: The walls of the archway are made of an extremely smooth kind of stone. While you're examining it, you see a black substance inside, moving slightly, as if it knows you are watching.

rooms.title: The Western Archway
rooms.description: The walls of the archway are made of an extremely smooth kind of stone. While you're examining it, you see a black substance inside, moving slightly, as if it knows you are watching.

rooms.title: The Top Of The Watchtower
rooms.description: From up here you can see the Drakwald forest all around you.

rooms.title: The Donation Room
rooms.description: If you have anything to donate you can drop it in this room.
